title: He Needs To Pace Himself With Everything
itunes:title: He Needs To Pace Himself With Everything
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 30 and my fiancé is 28 years old. We have been together 2 years and he proposed 3 months ago. I’ve held out on intimacy with him until l got a commitment and he did not have a problem with that. The night that I got the ring, I gave in and we had sex that night. It was not what I expected at all. I’d seen him naked a million times and I knew what he was working with, but I had no idea if he knew what to do with it.............................................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
